271218a1-07f9-4717-8cbc-fce3a0450139.name: Armor
271218a1-07f9-4717-8cbc-fce3a0450139.notes: Meteoric and Orichalcum are mutually exclusive

aed71883-55b1-45ef-901d-a52dc9e3a050.name: Hobnails
aed71883-55b1-45ef-901d-a52dc9e3a050.notes: Cancels the -2 to attack and -1 to defend (but not the movement penalties) for Bad Footing

d4f0ad21-22a9-4a81-8954-329c2e27bdda.name: Giant-Spider Silk
d4f0ad21-22a9-4a81-8954-329c2e27bdda.notes: Allows this armor to be worn under other armor without -1 to DX for layering

c98dc896-6a6c-445e-907e-d8431820c355.name: Spiked
c98dc896-6a6c-445e-907e-d8431820c355.notes: Every turn, roll DX-4 to stab each enemy in close combat with you as a free action; success deals 1d-2 imp damage; In addition, anyone who strikes such armor with an unarmed attack takes this damage to the attacking body part — and if the attack is a bite, grapple, or anything under Slams, Tramples, and Overruns (DFX40), the attacker suffers 4 points of damage

90d015a6-b379-4b63-ab4d-93b86e7f738d.name: Thieves’
90d015a6-b379-4b63-ab4d-93b86e7f738d.notes: Blackened; May not be Ornate; After adding this to your armor, edit the armor and enable the "Ignore weight for skills" checkbox

2296e7ec-d954-4aa5-abd6-e22eb47c4147.name: Shields
2296e7ec-d954-4aa5-abd6-e22eb47c4147.notes: Dwarven, Meteoric, and Orichalcum are mutually exclusive

0995da14-36a5-4d99-94af-46ab704afd98.name: Dwarven
0995da14-36a5-4d99-94af-46ab704afd98.notes: Fireproof; Made from iron instead of wood

6ae07fff-8188-4540-8fca-ee82b23a6e69.name: For Dwarven, Meteoric, or Orichalcum shields only

15a0253f-220e-4252-ad54-1d1a82914aa7.name: Mirrored
15a0253f-220e-4252-ad54-1d1a82914aa7.notes: Target of a reflected gaze gets +3 to resist

2272d235-dec5-4bb7-a99a-f2e968196103.name: Mirrored
2272d235-dec5-4bb7-a99a-f2e968196103.notes: Target of a reflected gaze gets +3 to resist

86fba65e-ae3b-45dc-a4ec-116c38f617e3.name: Orichalcum
86fba65e-ae3b-45dc-a4ec-116c38f617e3.notes: Unbreakable; Fireproof; +2 to odds of breakage of non-Orichalcum weapons parrying a Shield Bash or Shield Rush

676ad3c1-eca0-4594-975e-ddda70a45d59.name: Weapons
676ad3c1-eca0-4594-975e-ddda70a45d59.notes: Meteoric, Orichalcum, and solid Silver are mutually exclusive; Fine, Very Fine, and solid Silver are mutually exclusive

21d97c2c-e89a-4ceb-9c86-427adc83a2d8.name: Dwarven
21d97c2c-e89a-4ceb-9c86-427adc83a2d8.notes: Changes a Parry of 0U to 0 (manually adjust)

0d66850a-b6f3-4c5f-925d-7364d3bce5d4.name: For arrow and crossbow bolt only

c72f927a-25ec-4348-ab07-90852284f5c8.name: Bodkin Point
c72f927a-25ec-4348-ab07-90852284f5c8.notes: Changes damage type to pi and adds armor divisor (2)

56e2b543-d7e3-4701-9a83-3606b8f56adf.name: Flaming
56e2b543-d7e3-4701-9a83-3606b8f56adf.notes: Takes a ready maneuver to ignite before use; Must be fired within 3 seconds of ignition; -2 to hit; Inflicts additional 1 burn damage as follow-up

3f66c16a-e9cb-4573-a81c-ef3eb906669c.name: For blowpipe, bow, and crossbow only

eb16421c-6f5b-4555-9b47-778e9d8ce15a.name: Bow-Harp
eb16421c-6f5b-4555-9b47-778e9d8ce15a.notes: Allows the bow to be used as a harp as well

ffb2d72b-1f0a-41f2-8e68-461bfeb71323.name: Elven
ffb2d72b-1f0a-41f2-8e68-461bfeb71323.notes: Lets a bow shoot at +2 to ST for range and damage purposes without increasing its required ST (manually adjust)

0e60d20e-27c5-43c7-9d63-b215b971f2c5.name: Crossbow Sling
0e60d20e-27c5-43c7-9d63-b215b971f2c5.notes: Totes a loaded crossbow hands free; Free action to sling

b5a0738b-2512-42d9-bdd5-04302755bf51.name: For fencing weapons and swords only

1a911f98-05c6-4164-b2fe-f2d22ac0caa5.name: For hatchet, jutte, pick, sai, sickle, tonfa, and one-handed axe only

93bc466a-8ad8-4db5-afe1-83c50600ccc5.name: For melee weapon, thrown weapon, and projectile only

7089ba47-8073-4c49-baa2-f865799c9918.name: For fencing weapons, swords, blowpipes, bows, and crossbows

e9407255-8dcf-41fe-a813-f508cc2bc4ad.name: For other cutting melee or thrown weapons

d57ffab3-a308-467a-b66d-47e401cb3c42.name: For projectiles and crushing- or impaling-only melee or thrown weapons

7953d157-d3f7-45ec-8273-ed54539f14e3.name: Silver Coating
7953d157-d3f7-45ec-8273-ed54539f14e3.notes: Penetration wound modifiers drop a level: x2 becomes x1.5, x3 becomes x2, and x4 becomes x3

504dcc8c-5dc0-4851-a2b3-8e205fcdad3e.name: Orichalcum
504dcc8c-5dc0-4851-a2b3-8e205fcdad3e.notes: Unbreakable; +2 to odds of breakage of non-orichalcum weapons parrying this weapon
